sections.heading: Counsel right of juvenile, parent or guardian; appointment; guardian ad litem8-221
sections.text: Counsel right of juvenile, parent or guardian; appointment; guardian ad litemA. The court shall appoint an attorney for a child in all delinquency proceedings that commence with a petition or that may involve detentio
